title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: You may yearn for the expression of wild creativity or ache for the joys of romance. However, your fear of rejection could hold you back from fully pursuing your dreams. The square between stuffy Saturn and the playful Libra Moon in your 5th House of Pleasure suggests moderation is key. The goal isnt necessarily to tame your fun, but to structure it so you can enjoy yourself safely and on your own terms. Unfortunately, you cant arrange the details of your delight until you first take a risk with your heart. Dont leave your passion locked in a cage when your spirit needs to soar. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
